person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: European Union rice experts on Thursday postponed discussion on area aid payments to rice producers because the documents were not available in all the EU languages , an EU offcial said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

1. European Union (organization)
2. EU officials (group of people)
3. Rice experts (group of people)
4. An EU official (specific person)

So, the identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are "an EU official" and the unspecified EU officials mentioned in the first sentence.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. EU officials (group of people)
2. An EU official (specific person)

So, the only identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are "an EU official" and the unspecified EU officials mentioned in the first sentence.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| EU officials |
| an EU official |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: European Union rice experts on Thursday postponed discussion on area aid payments to rice producers because the documents were not available in all the EU languages , an EU offcial said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

1. European Union (EU)

The European Union is the location where the rice experts are based and where the discussion about area aid payments to rice producers was supposed to take place.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: European Union rice experts on Thursday postponed discussion on area aid payments to rice producers because the documents were not available in all the EU languages , an EU offcial said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

1. European Union (EU)
2. EU officials

These are the organizations mentioned in the paragraph. The European Union is an intergovernmental political and economic union of 27 European countries, and the EU officials are individuals working for the European Union.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
